entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of rain before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
